1: I help the poor, and I am supported in times of need.
2: I am preserved and blessed on the earth.
3: I am renewed and supported in times of illness.
4: I trust in kindness and embrace healing for my soul.
5: I focus on positivity and let go of negativity.
6: I share uplifting thoughts that inspire others.
7: I rise above negativity and focus on love and positivity.
8: I rise up stronger every day and embrace my health.
9: I choose to trust in the supportive friendships I build.
10: I receive mercy and rise up to show gratitude.
11: I feel favored because I rise above my challenges.
12: I am supported in my integrity and embraced forever.
13: I celebrate the eternal goodness of the divine.
